鉒字的基本解释

鉒
zhù
矿藏：“上有铅者，其下有鉒银”。
古代送死人的器物。
祭器。
古通“注”，赌注；引申为赌射，投掷：“以瓦鉒者全”。

鉒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhù］
［《廣韻》中句切，去遇，知。］
(1)矿石。或谓为“鈺”、“鈓”的讹字。
(2)通“注”。赌注。引申为赌射、投掷。

鉒字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鉒； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1301第08
【廣韻】中句切【集韻】株遇切，?音註。【玉篇】器也。送死人具也。　又【博雅】署置也。又【淮南子·說林訓】以瓦鉒者全，以金鉒者跋，以玉鉒者發。【註】鉒者提馬，雒家謂之跋。　又【通雅】鉒金，鉒銀，皆丱也。【管子·地數篇】上有鈆者，其下有鉒銀。上有丹砂者，其下有鉒金。上有慈石者，其下有鉒銅。此山之見榮者也。　又【集韻】【韻會】?朱戍切，音注。義同。

鉒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鉒字的起名意思

暂无。

鉒
Basic explanation of words
鉒
zhù
Mineral deposits: "If there is lead on the top, there is silver on the bottom."
The artifacts used to send the dead in ancient times.
Sacrificial vessel.
Gutong "bet", bet; the extension is gambling shooting, throwing: "all with valet".
鉒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhù］
[Sentence cut in "Guangyun", to meet, to know. ]
(1) Ore. Or the wrong word called "Yu" or "鈓".
(2) Through "Note". bet. The extension is gambling shooting and throwing.
鉒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鉒; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 1301 to 08
[Guang Yun] Chinese sentence cut [Ji Yun] When every tree meets cut,? Phonetic note. [Jade articles] Tools also. Sending the dead to the dead also.　[Bo Ya] Department also placed. Also [Huainanzi·Said Lin Xun] Those who use wa 鉒 for all, those who use gold 鉒 for postscript, and those who use jade 鉒 for post. [Note] The 鉒 person raises the horse, and the 雒 family is called the postscript.　[Tongya] 鉒金,鉒silver, both are also. [Guanzi·Dishu articles] There are 鈆 on the top, and 鉒yin below. There is dansha on the top, and gold on the bottom. There is a kind of stone above, and there is copper underneath. Those who see the glory of this mountain are also.　[Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Zhu Shuqie, phonetic notation. The same meaning.
